definitions.definition: The living quarters of a ship designated for the commissioned officers other than the captain .
The commissioned officers of a ship, excluding the captain.
examples: The captain rarely referred to his wardroom for advice, and this resulted in their discontent.

main_definition: ( nautical ) The living quarters of a ship designated for the commissioned officers other than the captain .
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) The commissioned officers of a ship, excluding the captain.
